title: Paradox Champions League – The Ultimate Football Faceoff
desc:

title: Unmask the rogue AI — Ghost in the Firewall
desc:
Unmask the rogue AI. Defend the future. 🤖

Step into Ghost in the Firewall at Paradox’25 — a high-stakes cybersecurity challenge where hacking meets mystery. 🧑🏻‍💻

Decode. Defend. Discover the truth.

2 days. Real tools. Team up (1–4). No expert skills needed — just logic, curiosity, and a will to win.

🎟️ Register Now (Link in bio): https://iitmparadox.org/events/17

@paradox_iitmadras

title: Hack Eclipse — Overnight Hackathon
desc:
🌌 The night is dark, the code is alive… and greatness is just one keystroke away.

Let the caffeine kick in ☕ and...

⚔️ Welcome to HACK ECLIPSE – where legends don’t sleep, they deploy. This isn’t just a hackathon. It’s a digital battlefield.
👾 24 hours. One shot. Infinite adrenaline.

👨‍💻 Team up with 3–4 code-blooded warriors
💡 Choose your battleground: Environment | Healthcare | Education | Fintech | Open Innovation

💰 Prize Pool: ₹10k+
🔥 Mentors and more.

🔗 Register now: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/hack-a-thon/hack-eclipse

title: Into the Shadows — A Special Forces Veteran Speaks
desc:
Into the Shadows: A Special Forces Veteran Speaks

Some stories are meant to be heard—stories of unwavering courage, grit and resilience in the face of impossible odds.

Join us for an inspiring and gripping session as a former Special Forces operative Maj. Sushant Singh shares firsthand stories of courage, resilience and valor.

🗓️ Date : 13th February, 2025
⏰ Time : 6 PM Onwards
🎙️ Guest Speaker : Major Sushant Singh
🔗 Meet Link : https://meet.google.com/ukf-hhzs-fux

title: Python Odyssey — Join the Coding Journey
desc:

title: How old is the Mahabharata? — Talk by Nilesh Oak
desc:
How old is the Mahabharata? 🤔 Could it really be 7500 years old? 🌌

Can science validate the Mahabharata’s timeline?🤯

Join Nilesh Oak as he takes us on a journey of science, history, and epics to uncover the secrets of our past.

⏰ 7:00 PM Onwards

title: How to Improve Concentration — Swami Mukundanand Ji Maharaj
desc:
Dear Friends,

We are pleased to invite you to an enlightening talk on "How to Improve Concentration" by Swami Mukundanand Ji Maharaj, a global spiritual leader and founder of JKYog. The talk is organized by Sundarbans House and will take place on 26th March from 7:00 - 8:30 pm.

Registration Link in Bio
